author: Robert Carty
text:
This is a great TED talk featuring Code For America founder Jennifer Pahlka.
http://codeforamerica.org/2012/03/08/jennifer-pahlka-at-ted-video/
"We’re not going to fix government until we fix citizenship."
We know of some cities, towns and counties working together to develop shared platforms; so shout out what you're working on.  Especially if it's something that encourages community building in addition to solving a problem.
title: Is anyone out there developing shared apps?
